    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    App
    The App class launches the JavaFX application for the POS system.
    AppController
    The AppController class manages the main interface of the POS system.
    Category
    The Category class represents a product category in the POS system.
    dbSetup
    The dbSetup class loads a .env and populates a username and password a customer orders an item at the boba shop
    EmployeeController
    The EmployeeController class sets up all functions to make the employee window interactive
    EmployeeRow
    Represents a single employee record containing ID, name, role, and status.
    Ingredient
    The Ingredient class creates an abstraction of an ingredient that is used to make a product at a boba shop
    ManagerController
    The ManagerController class allows managers to manage the inventory and acts as the homepage for the other manager features
    ManagerController.InventoryItem
    Model class for inventory items displayed in the TableView.
    MenuController
    The MenuController class handles the management of menu items within the application.
    OrderItem
    The OrderItems class creates an abstraction of an order that can be made when a customer orders an item at the boba shop
    ProductIngredient
    The ProductIngredient class gets the infomation about the ingredients of the product from the database, it records all the ingredients that each product uses.
    ProductRow
    The ProductRow class gets the product information from the database, allowing it to be put into the product table
    Products
    The Products class is a container for a product a customer might order from the boba store.
    ReportController
    This class has all of the functionality needed to generated most of the reports needed except for Sales and Restock report which are in a seperate tab.
    ReportController.SignatureRow
     
    SalesAndRestockController
    The SaleAndRestockController class have all information about Sale and Restock report, it can check the sale data in a self-input time interval, it can also restock all items and just restock a selected item.
    SalesAndRestockController.Row
    This class is a generics table model, it store the row data about the order.
    SalesAndRestockController.SalesRow
    This class is a model to get the information of sale data and set to a row.
